pt.ulisboa.tecnico.sirs

Interface NHSInterface

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NHS

    public interface NHSInterface
extends Remote
    This is the NHS interface that will be called by remote entities, like Doctors

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<Record> getRecords(FetchAuthorization authorization, PublicKey patient)
      This method receives an authorization issued by a trusted hospital and a patient public key.
      void putRecord(PutAuthorization authorization, Record record)
      This method receives an authorization issued by a trusted hospital and a record.

    • Method Detail

      • putRecord

        void putRecord(PutAuthorization authorization,
               Record record)
        throws RemoteException,
               NotAuthorizedException,
               SecurityLibraryException
        This method receives an authorization issued by a trusted hospital and a record. If the authorization is valid, the record is inserted in the datastore, otherwise NotAuthorizedException is thrown
        Parameters:
        authorization - Authorization issued by a trusted hospital
        record - Record being inserted
        Throws:
        RemoteException - Is thrown when RMI is shutdown/network inaccessible
        NotAuthorizedException - Is thrown when authorization is invalid
        SecurityLibraryException - Is thrown when digital signature validation runs into problem

      • getRecords

        List<Record> getRecords(FetchAuthorization authorization,
                        PublicKey patient)
                 throws RemoteException,
                        NotAuthorizedException,
                        SecurityLibraryException
        This method receives an authorization issued by a trusted hospital and a patient public key. If the authorization is valid, the NHS returns all patient records with that public key, otherwise NotAuthorizedException is thrown
        Parameters:
        authorization - Authorization issued by a trusted hospital
        patient - Public key correspondent to the patient
        Returns:
        Returns a list with patient records
        Throws:
        RemoteException - Is thrown when RMI is shutdown/network inaccessible
        NotAuthorizedException - Is thrown when authorization is invalid
        SecurityLibraryException - Is thrown when digital signature validation runs into problem
